name: Bit Storm VR: First Loop
description:
Bit Storm VR: First Loop is a Sci-Fi VR FPS featuring unique combat with over a dozen weapons and abilities supporting both the Oculus Rift and the HTC Vive.

The year is 4216 and the majority of the Atlastrian Fleet's force has been replaced by machinery. An unknown enemy creates a virus infecting your fleet's robots turning them hostile. It's up to you to save the Atlastrian Galaxy. With over a dozen unique weapons and abilities at your disposal, there are many different combat styles. Use EMP pulses to stun your enemies and explosives to stop them in their tracks. When they get too close, shred them to pieces with your sword and defend yourself with your shield.

Game Features:

  • Fast paced action packed gameplay!
  • Intuitive two handed aiming
  • Realistic Sword Combat
  • Touchpad and Teleportation Locomotion
  • Thirteen unique weapons. Each weapon can be leveled up and offers a unique play style
  • Four story driven levels
  • An in-depth story and unique characters.
  • Environment that switches from day to night

Are you ready for the Storm?
